issue.title: [FlightRPC][Java] JDBC driver for Flight SQL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15452](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15452). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This implements a JDBC driver able to communicate to Flight SQL sources.

So far this covers:
- Metadata retrieval by DatabaseMetadata, ResultSetMetadata, etc.
- Query execution by statements and prepared statements
  
  Yet to be done:
- Parameter binding on prepared statements
